system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.pTE8c8BZNlsYPWTN]{Handgun Specialist}

Benefits

Once per turn, the character can perform a burst fire, sprayfire or sweepfire attack with a handgun or a machine pistol with full auto or burst fire firing modes for half their normal Combat Point cost, rounded up.
system.summary: Halved cost for burstfire, sweepfire or sprayfire once per round.
